Summary: walking across yard looked up saw fluresent green light moving across
divs: Sighting Details i was walking across my back yard going to the front of my house i looked up and saw a really bright flurecent green ball of light the best way i can describe it is it looked like a comet shape around the front round part it had a little bit of red and blue it lasted for about 4 or 5 seconds it was moving in the derction from back yard towrd the front going through the sky it was about as high up as a big plane would fly i went in the house and told my feance about it i called carrol county 911 and ask them did anyone call and report the samething i saw she put me on hold for about a minute and come back and said that a officer had said he seen the samething and said it was just a metteroite me personally i dont know what i saw it made no sound but ive seen pictures of haleys comet comets and metorites from what ive seen are not this color i dont know how to feel about what i saw i just know it was defnently neet maybe somebody will be able to explain to me what it was i would like to know.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Temple
There were no other sightings in Temple on or around February 16th 2012
